tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE festival_schedule (
  performer_id INT,
  performer_name VARCHAR,
  showtime TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE ShowLineup (
    lineup_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    show_id INT,
    performer_id INT,
    lineup_order INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (show_id) REFERENCES Shows(show_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (performer_id) REFERENCES Performers(performer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE performer (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
name VARCHAR(50),
age INT,
comedy_style VARCHAR(50));

CREATE TABLE showtime (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
show_date DATE,
start_time TIME,
end_time TIME,
location VARCHAR(100));

CREATE TABLE schedule (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
showtime_id INT,
performer_id INT,
FOREIGN KEY (showtime_id) REFERENCES showtime(id),
FOREIGN KEY (performer_id) REFERENCES performer(id));

CREATE TABLE ticket (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
price DECIMAL(8,2),
quantity INT,
schedule_id INT,
FOREIGN KEY (schedule_id) REFERENCES schedule(id));

CREATE TABLE Shows (
    show_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    show_name VARCHAR(255),
    show_date DATE,
    show_time TIME,
    performer_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (performer_id) REFERENCES Performers(performer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Tickets (
    ticket_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    show_id INT,
    ticket_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    ticket_quantity INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (show_id) REFERENCES Shows(show_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Schedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    show_id INT,
    venue_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (show_id) REFERENCES Shows(show_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (venue_id) REFERENCES Venues(venue_id)
);
